sections.heading: of application and construction
sections.text: In applying and construing the Nebraska Uniform Protected Series Act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact the Uniform Protected Series Act.SourceLaws 2018, LB1121, ยง 40;Law

21-539.Uniformity of application and construction.

In applying and construing the Nebraska Uniform Protected Series Act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact the Uniform Protected Series Act.

SourceLaws 2018, LB1121, ยง 40;Laws 2019, LB78, ยง 20.
